overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Nostr Web of Trust provides two complementary tools for trust-based filtering:

oracle.title: WoT Oracle
oracle.description: REST API for server-side queries at scale

overview.fundamentalQuestion: Both answer the same fundamental question:
overview.question: "What is the social distance between two pubkeys?"

extensionSetup.title: Extension Setup
extensionSetup.objectInto: object into every page. Check for its existence before using:

getDistance.title: getDistance(targetPubkey)
getDistance.description: Returns the number of hops from the user's pubkey to the target.

isInMyWot.title: isInMyWoT(targetPubkey, maxHops?)
isInMyWot.description: Boolean check if a pubkey is within your web of trust threshold.

getDistanceBetween.title: getDistanceBetween(fromPubkey, toPubkey)
getDistanceBetween.description: Query the distance between any two pubkeys, not just from your own.

comments.checkConnection: // Check how connected two other users are

oracleDistance.title: GET /distance
oracleDistance.description: Query the social distance between two pubkeys.

oracleBatch.title: POST /distance/batch
oracleBatch.description: Query distances from one pubkey to multiple targets.

oracleStats.title: GET /stats
oracleStats.description: Get statistics about the indexed graph.

oracleHealth.title: GET /health
oracleHealth.description: Health check endpoint for monitoring and load balancers.

getTrustScore.title: getTrustScore(targetPubkey)
getTrustScore.description: Returns a normalized trust score (0-1) based on distance and relationship bonuses.

getDetails.title: getDetails(targetPubkey)
getDetails.description: Returns detailed trust information including distance, score, paths, and relationship data.
getDetails.returnsDescription: Object with distance, score, paths count, mutual follow status, and bridging nodes.

getConfig.title: getConfig()
getConfig.description: Returns the current extension configuration including mode, relays, and scoring weights.
getConfig.returnsDescription: Configuration object with mode, relays, scoring weights, and cache settings.
